column5: I am trying to find the link on the old board to the depth charts for the great lakes. Anyone out there have it??
Thanks Tjsa, but I don't seee the depth charts on that page
Wanna cheap GPS unit for the boat? Get in touch with Robin. He's got a line on non-current X-15's for a song....
Thanks Jeff but I am looking at buying the lcx25c after xmas.
play around with this site man, you'll find what you need.  http://www.marineplanner.com/
Thanks Boston, that is what I was looking for.
Thanks EE that is also a good one.
Click on the CONTOURS link, then click on the lake name at the top of the next page.

Anyone use that marine planner site.  I signed up and downlaoded a map . very easy but did I miss something I got a KAP file type and it comes up as an unknown file application.  I guess I need to buy the mapping software?
Thanks Tjsa, I will try that.  That is a great link for water temps Tjsa, but I was looking for depths. Thanks for all the help, I appreciate it.
